Title: Yurumates 3D
Description: ['Yurume, an 18-year-old "ronin" and recent high school graduate, has high hopes of being accepted and attending Tokyo University. She moves into an apartment complex, the Maison du Wish, located on the outskirts of Tokyo where other ronins living there are studying for upcoming college acceptance exams.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Yurumates', 'Other: Yurumates', 'Sequel: Yurumates 3D Plus', 'Side story: Yurumates 3D OVA']
